info.title: Snack Proud API
info.description:
This is an API created for the Snack Proud web application only. Screen sets are the same as labeled in figma file. The screen numbers are from left to right as contained in the figma file. All API and service listings in the table are clickable and will jump you to the related API.
Screen set Screen numbers Service/APIs
Account setup
1 NONE
2-4 Services:
  • Auth0 - authentication
5-11 APIs:
  • POST - /account/register/individual
Setting up box
1 NONE
2 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id
  • PATCH - /seller/boxes/:box_id/doneSetup
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id/products
  • GET - /seller/boxes
  • PATCH - /seller/boxes
  • PATCH - /seller/products
  • PATCH - /seller/products/active/{snack_id}
3 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id/products
  • GET - /seller/boxes
  • GET - /seller/boxes/stats
  • PATCH - /seller/boxes
  • PATCH - /seller/products
  • PATCH - /seller/products/active/{snack_id}
4 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/dashboard/overview
  • GET - /seller/ dashboard/leaderboard
  • GET - /seller/boxes?stats=true
  • PATCH - /seller/products/active/{snack_id}
5 NONE
Coming back in future
1 Services:
  • Auth0 - authentication
2 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/dashboard/overview
  • GET - /seller/ dashboard/leaderboard
  • GET - /seller/boxes?stats=true
3 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id/products
  • GET - /seller/boxes
  • PATCH - /seller/boxes
  • PATCH - /seller/products
  • PATCH - /seller/products/active/{snack_id}
4 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/snackproud/products/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/snackproud/MonthlyRefill/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/boxes?stats=true
5-6 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • POST - /seller/snackproud/products/order
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id/delivery
  • PATCH - /seller/boxes/:box_id/delivery
7 Services:
  • Cloudinary - Image urls
APIs:
  • GET - /seller/snackproud/products/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/snackproud/MonthlyRefill/:box_id
  • GET - /seller/boxes/:box_id?stats=true
Account Management
1-2 APIs:
  • GET - /account/userData
  • PATCH - /account/userData
3-4 Services:
  • Auth0 - authentication
5 APIs:
  • GET - /account/deliveryData
  • PATCH - /account/deliveryData
6 APIs:
  • GET - /account/orderHistory
  • GET - /account/orderHistory/{order_id}/items
7 APIs:
  • GET - /account/userData
  • PATCH - /account/userData

servers.description: Internet facing testing version of the API.
Local testing version of the API.

tags.name: 8 - Seller - Buy Product
tags.description: APIs to order products to add to a box

tags.name: 10 - Authentication
tags.description: APIs to do custom Auth0 functionality

get.summary: 1.1 - Get a box for a buyer
get.description: Get box details including the _id (this is just the box_ID), name, and all the active products inside the box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The id of the box to retrieve.

200.description: The box information with all products contained inside the box

products.name: Choc Not Choc, Mint Brownie ball
products.description:
Snack Proud raw chocolate truffles are very indulgent and delicious and taste like an after-dinner mint brownie.
There are chocolate chunks and coconut chips in the middle. Safely portion-controlled so you can keep one in their handbag to have between meetings.

products.name: Googys, Collagen Protein Bar
products.description: Enjoy the new Googys Collagen Bar, with low in carbohydrates, high in protein & good fats

products.name: Snack-Proud-Edamame
products.description: This is a great snack to munch on like peanuts or a yummy topping to salads too for extra crunch.

post.summary: 2.1 - Make an intent to purchase products using Stripe
post.description: This api will return a client_secret for a payment_intent (This is a Stripe connect feature). For more information please go to: https://stripe.com/docs/connect/collect-then-transfer-guide. NOTE: This token is only valid 24 hours after creation. The test publishable api key required is: pk_test_51HfgNBHHvC6AAOnBFVXNbh6fRHjkQGpDdJIyaWrBQndSa8tpaol8I2RXrerNIM6AHT1pDXJIoNL0M6WjcSe4Tzap00ncgMYOt1

requestBody.description: A cart object of all the items to buy

get.summary: 3.1 - Get prefilled account information from code
get.description: Create a stripe account for a individual with the details given

parameters.name: pending_account_id
parameters.description: The pending account id

post.description: Create a stripe account for a individual with the details given

requestBody.description: Data to create Stripe account with.

206.description: Account has been created, box was trying to be created however failed.

get.description: Get all the users data stored

patch.description: Update the users data with new given data

get.description: Get all the users delivery data
Get a users order history for all boxes.

get.summary: 4.6 - Get reorder information from past order
get.description: Gets the reorder information given the id of a past order.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The id of the past order

get.description: Get all the stats required for the dashboard.

parameters.name: date_enum
parameters.description: From what time to compute stats from. (defualt value when not provided is week)

200.description: Stats for the dashboard of the authenticated account.

get.description: Get the leaderboard for the dashboard.

parameters.name: date_enum
parameters.description: From what time to compute stats from. (defualt value when not provided is week)

200.description: An array of the most popular iems over all boxes in decending order.

get.description: Get all boxes owned by the user

parameters.name: stats
parameters.description: get box stats?

parameters.name: date_enum
parameters.description: From what time to compute stats from. (defualt value when not provided is week)

get.description: Get the details of a box with the given ID if box is owned.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The id of the box to get details of

200.description: The details of a specific box

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The id of the box to update

get.description: Get the delivery details for a given box or returns the account details if a box does not have any delivery information attached to it.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The box id to get delivery details for

200.description: The delivery details of the box.

patch.description: Update the delivery details for a given box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The box id to update the delivery details for

get.summary: 6.6 - Get stats of a given box
get.description: Get the stats of a given box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The box id to get stats for

parameters.name: date_enum
parameters.description: From what time to compute stats from. (defualt value when not provided is week)

patch.description: Sets the new flag to false. This is just a more light weight version of update to the box api.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The id of the box to set as setup

200.description: The boxes new flag has been set to false

patch.description: Set the last topup date to the current date for the given box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The id of the box this is in reference to

200.description: The boxes last topup date has been set

get.description: Get all customer products inside a given box

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: The box id to get products from

parameters.name: date_enum
parameters.description: From what time to compute stats from. (defualt value when not provided is week)

200.description: A list of all the products inside the box

products.name: Choc Not Choc, Mint Brownie ball
products.description: Snack Proud raw chocolate truffles are very indulgent and delicious and taste like an after dinner mint brownie.\nThere are chocolate chunks and coconut chips in the middle. Safely portion-controlled so you can keep one in their handbag to have between meetings.

patch.description: Update one or more products. For preformance reasons it is preferable if only items that need to be updated are passed here.

200.description: A list of errors if any. If list is empty all completed sucessfully.

example.message: User is not autherized to access resource

patch.description: The api will toggle the activate state of the product with the given id.

parameters.name: snack_id
parameters.description: Product to set as active

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Active state to set product to

200.description: The product's active state was successfuly set

get.summary: 8.1 - Get products avaliable to restock with.
get.description: Get list of products that seller can buy.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: id of the box this list is relivant to.

200.description: A JSON object with containing a list of item a seller can buy.

get.description: Get list of monthly refills that seller can buy. Returned list is ordered by price.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: id of the box this list is relivant to.

200.description: A JSON object with containing a list of item a seller can buy.

post.description: Create an order to refill boxes with refill products.

get.description: Get all boxes avaliable to buy

200.description: Successfully retireved boxes avaliable to buy.

post.description: This will send an order off for a box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: id of the box to order.

patch.description: This api will allow you to change the currently authenticated users, username or password.

get.description: This api will retrieve the entire cart for every box.

cart.name: Googys, Collagen Protein Bar, Mixed Berry
cart.description: 20 Googys, Collagen Protein Bar to satisfy your taste buds

patch.description: This api will remove an item in the users cart

get.description: This api will return the total number of products currently in the users cart
This api will retrieve the cart for a single box.

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: ID of the box you want the cart for

box_cart.name: Googys, Collagen Protein Bar, Mixed Berry
box_cart.description: 20 Googys, Collagen Protein Bar to satisfy your taste buds

patch.description: This api will add/update an item in the users cart

parameters.name: box_id
parameters.description: ID of the box that item is being ordered for

address_line2.description: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).
Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

image_url.description: url of the image on the CDN

cart_for_buyer.description: List of items intended to buy

client_secret.description:
The client secret of this PaymentIntent. Used for client-side retrieval using a publishable key.

The client secret can be used to complete a payment from your frontend.

price.description: Total for the cart computed at the back-end (in cents).

payment_intent_for_buyer.description: Required Stripe information to complete a purchase for a buyer.

dob.description: The persons date of birth in ISO format.

account_type.description: The Stripe account type linked to this account. Not for use in current phase by front-end.

account_for.description: What is the account for (what was selected during sign-up).

account_for_name.description: The summary description that mapped to account_for during sign-up

fundraising.description: A feild that will only exist if the user selected fundraising during sign-up

account_num_last_4.description: The last four digits of the users account.

BSB.description: The BSB for the users bank account

image_name.description: name of the last image that was sent to Stripe

instructions.description: Any custom instructions the user has delivery.

name.description: person to deliver it to name

topping_up.description: Is the box being topped up

last_updated.description: when the box was last updated
Date the box was last updated.

total_sold_since_update.description: Total snacks sold since box was last updated.

total_profit_since_update.description: Total profit since box was last updated.

sold.description: Total number of snacks sold since date_enum.

has_made_sale.description: Has the box ever made a sale.

image_url.description: The image url of the product

price.description: The current selling price for the product

rrp.description: The default price for a product

request_count.description: number of requests for an item. This is currently a placeholder for furutre development and should be ignored.

preset_products.description: All products that are included in this item

total_quantity.description: Total number of products to be added by this item if bought

on_hand.description: Total number of snacks owned inside this item.

type.description: Type of product. This is not currently relivant for this stage.

preset_products.description: All products that are included in this item

total_quantity.description: Total number of products to be added by this item if bought

on_hand.description: Total number of snacks owned inside this item.

date.description: Date the order was made in ISO date format.

personal_identification.description:
The individual’s verification document information.

An identifying document, either a passport or local ID card.

The uploaded file needs to be a color image (smaller than 8,000px by 8,000px), in JPG, PNG, or PDF format, and less than 10 MB in size.

address_line1.description: street address of the individual is located in.

address_line2.description: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

address_postal_code.description: The zip code of the individual is located in.

address_city.description: The city the individual is located in.

address_state.description: The state the individual is located in.

address_country.description: The country the individual is located in.

account_for.description: Is the account for Personal account or Buiness account. Enum = [Personal, Business]

account_for_name.description: Name related to the ownership type of the account

bank_BSB.description: The BSB for the bank account for funds to be transfered to.

bank_account_number.description: The account number for the bank account for funds to be transfered to.

dlvr_address_line2.description: Address line 2 (e.g., apartment, suite, unit, or building).

dlvr_address_postal_code.description: The zip code to deliver to.

dlvr_name.description: Person name to recieve the delivery.

pending_acc_id.description: id used to get pending account info details on the pending box info (required if preset_box_ID is given).

preset_box_ID.description: ID of the box to create when creating the users account.

message.description: A message of what went wrong.

personal_identification.description:
The individual’s verification document information.

An identifying document, either a passport or local ID card.

The uploaded file needs to be a color image (smaller than 8,000px by 8,000px), in JPG, PNG, or PDF format, and less than 10 MB in size.

account_for_name.description: Name related to the ownership type of the account

bank_BSB.description: The BSB for the bank account for funds to be transfered to.

bank_account_number.description: The account number for the bank account for funds to be transfered to.

_id.description: ID of the box the order is relevant to.

name.description: Name of the box this order is relevant to.

_id.description: Snack proud product ID that was ordered.

price.description: Price each individual item was bought for (in cents).

date.description: The date the order was placed

invoice_num.description: The invoice number for the order. If no invoice number has been assigned then value will be "pending".

invoice_download.description: A url to the invoice. This only exists if the invoice exists in the system.

box_id.description: The id of the box the order was for

_id.description: ID of the item to update.

available.description: New number of avaliable for the given item.

active.description: Is the product visable to buyers.

boxes.name: 80 piece snack box with display

cart_total.description: Total cost of all items in the cart

product_id.description: ID of the product to remove for the given box

cart_size.description: The total number of products in the cart

cart_total.description: Total cost of all items in the cart

product_id.description: ID of the product to add/update in the users cart

quantity.description: number of the product to buy

_id.description: ID of the item to order

quantity.description: Number of the item to buy

items.description: Array list of items to order

price.description: price the item was bought for

account_for_name.description: What is the account for in relation to the account_for feild

fundraising_name.description: Name of funderaiser if they are for a fundraiser

bank_bsb.description: Users bsb for there bank account

preset_box_ID.description: ID of the box to create when creating the users account

inline_response_200_2_box_details.description: create box for new account details

price.description: Price of the item in cents

image_url.description: A url for the CDN containing the image

total_quantity.description: The total pack size of the product

quantity.description: number of the product that was order

sold.description: total number of the product solde for the week (or given period if date_enum is provided)

image_url.description: url that contains an image of the item

price.description: cost of the box in cents
